member.name: DWRITE_INLINE_OBJECT_METRICS
member.summary: Contains properties describing the geometric measurement of an application-defined inline object.

member.name: DWRITE_INLINE_OBJECT_METRICS.width
member.summary: The width of the inline object.

member.name: DWRITE_INLINE_OBJECT_METRICS.height
member.summary: The height of the inline object.

member.name: DWRITE_INLINE_OBJECT_METRICS.baseline
member.summary: The distance from the top of the object to the point where it is lined up with the adjacent text. If the baseline is at the bottom, then baseline simply equals height.

member.name: DWRITE_INLINE_OBJECT_METRICS.supportsSideways
member.summary: A Boolean flag that indicates whether the object is to be placed upright or alongside the text baseline for vertical text.
